## SavedObjectsFindOptions.fields property

An array of fields to include in the results

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fields?: string[];
```

## Example

SavedObjects.find(<!-- -->{<!-- -->type: 'dashboard', fields: \['attributes.name', 'attributes.location'\]<!-- -->}<!-- -->)
